It will take time for 
$BOX to get their product development efforts ramped up over the next year. But to give perspective on the speculative potential. 

$4B $BOX
$17B MIRO (box canvas)
$20B Docusign (box sign)

Even if Box only manages to severely underperform and only capture a conservative 10% market share from MIRO and Docusign from Box’s 100K customers using these two pieces of software, that will still double Box’s market cap bringing them to. 

8B = $60 share in 2-3 years (conservative)

Now this cam obviously happen much faster if Box accelerates execution or if FOMO Reddit traders discover this mountain of potential. Whichever comes first. $MSFT $CRM $GOOG are all watching.
